elements.text: You're at the library when another person sits next to you. They are coughing and sneezing without using a tissue or their elbow, and it makes you feel uneasy. When you lean over to politely ask them to cough and sneeze into their elbow, they decide to follow this healthy...

elements.name: Sitting at the Library_Physical Health_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
